meanings.sent1: The movie was so unfunny that I fell asleep.
meanings.sent2: His jokes are always unfunny and make everyone groan.
meanings.sent3: The unfunny situation made us all chuckle at its absurdity.
meanings.sent4: Her attempts at humor were as unfunny as a rainy day at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The unfunny clown failed to make anyone laugh at the party.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's unfunny performance left the audience disappointed.
meanings.sent2: She tried to be funny, but her jokes were unfunny and awkward.
meanings.sent3: Even though his jokes were unfunny, his delivery was so serious that it made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unfunny script made the play feel like a never-ending lecture.
meanings.sent5: His unfunny remarks fell flat in the room full of laughter.
